about.title: About Me
about.name: Kotlaev Danil
about.description: Frontend developer with 4+ years of experience building modern web applications. Specialized in React, TypeScript and Next.js. Graduated from PSUTI with a degree in Computer Science.
about.description_2: Worked on e-commerce platforms, corporate educational systems and subscription services. Deep understanding of frontend architecture, state management and building responsive interfaces with animations.
about.description_3: Besides programming, I'm passionate about music, sound design and graphic design. I consider development a form of creativity and genuinely enjoy the process of creating products.

skuratov.description: Corporate educational platform for coffee shop chain with learning modules, personal accounts and gamification system.

responsibilities.0: Designed educational platform architecture from scratch
responsibilities.1: Developed learning module interface with gamification
responsibilities.2: Created personal account system for different user roles
responsibilities.3: Integrated custom video and audio players with progress tracking
responsibilities.4: Developed admin panel with tree-structured user hierarchy
responsibilities.5: Optimized responsive layout and UX for mobile devices
responsibilities.6: Set up CI/CD and automated deployment
responsibilities.8: Implemented interactive quizzes and drag-n-drop games
responsibilities.9: Developed lecture system with step-by-step completion
responsibilities.10: Created knowledge base for material storage and quick access
responsibilities.11: Built complex registration and authentication system

achievements.0: 90% of employees completed training courses monthly
achievements.1: Video and test loading time reduced by 40%
achievements.2: Notification system reduced missed courses by 30%
achievements.5: Enhanced user experience through navigation optimization and gamification
achievements.6: Created flexible system easily adaptable to new roles and structures

responsibilities.2: Integrated with Go REST API and implemented CRUD operations

responsibilities.7: Implemented tea box subscription and personalized recommendations
responsibilities.8: Created tea house table booking functionality
responsibilities.9: Optimized UI, responsive layout and performance

achievements.0: Conversion increased by 25% through UX optimization
achievements.1: Subscription system increased customer LTV by 30%
achievements.3: Responsive design for all device types
achievements.4: Stable integration with Go backend via REST API
achievements.5: Maintained high performance with large product catalog
